test.name: experiment saveBatch of runs with material inputs and outputs
test.url: library(Rlabkey) m1 <- labkey.experiment.createMaterial(list(name = "87444063.2604.626")) m2 <- labkey.experiment.createMaterial(list(name = "87444063.2604.625")) run <- labkey.experiment.createRun(list(name = "new run with materials"), materialInputs = m1, materialOutputs = m2) labkey.experiment.saveBatch(protocolName=labkey.experiment.SAMPLE_DERIVATION_PROTOCOL, runList=run, baseUrl=labkey.url.base, folderPath="%projectName%")

test.name: experiment saveBatch of runs with data inputs and outputs
test.url: library(Rlabkey) d1 <- labkey.experiment.createData(list(pipelinePath = "data.tsv")) d2 <- labkey.experiment.createData(list(pipelinePath = "result.txt")) run <- labkey.experiment.createRun(list(name = "new run with datas"), dataInputs = d1, dataOutputs = d2) labkey.experiment.saveBatch(protocolName=labkey.experiment.SAMPLE_DERIVATION_PROTOCOL, runList=run, baseUrl=labkey.url.base, folderPath="%projectName%")

test.name: labkey.saveBatch for assay with space in name
test.url: library(Rlabkey) labkey.saveBatch(baseUrl=labkey.url.base, folderPath="%projectName%", "Rlabkey GPAT Test", data.frame(SpecimenID=c(1,2,3)))

test.name: create sample type and load data
test.url: library(Rlabkey) df <- data.frame(name=c("test1","test2","test3"), customInt=c(1:3), customString=c("aaa", "bbb", "ccc")) labkey.domain.createAndLoad(baseUrl=labkey.url.base, folderPath="%projectName%", domainKind="SampleSet", df=df, name="test sample type with load data")

test.name: create data class and load data
test.url: library(Rlabkey) df <- data.frame(name=c("test1","test2","test3"), customInt=c(1:3), customString=c("aaa", "bbb", "ccc")) labkey.domain.createAndLoad(baseUrl=labkey.url.base, folderPath="%projectName%", domainKind="DataClass", df=df, name="test data class with load data")
